casebody.data:
Tomei, a Minor, f.k.a. Abouhassan, Appellee, v. Mayfield City Schools, Appellant, et al.

[Cite as Tomei v. Mayfield City Schools (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 198.]

*199(No. 00-460 Submitted February 28, 2001 Decided March 28, 2001.) Patrick M. Dukes, for appellant. Zashin & Rich Co., L.P.A., Jonathan A. Rich and Stephen S. Zashin, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Stevens v. Ackman (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 182, 743 N.E.2d 901.

Moyer, C-J-, Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
